data.title: Lizzy Caplan Is 'Excited' For 'Mean Girls' Movie Musical, Weighs In On If She'd Ever Reprise Role
data.meta_description: Lizzy Caplan is putting a new spin on the role of Alex Forrest in "Fatal Attraction"! At the premiere of the Paramount+ series, which reimagines on the 1987 thriller, the actress told Access Hollywood about finding compassion for the iconic character and filming one of the original's most memorable lines. Plus, she weighed in on the forthcoming "Mean Girls: The Musical" movie and if she'd ever reprise her role as Janis Ian in a new project. "I would trust anything Tina Fey would do," she said, adding, "I have been asked this, and it's definitely not up to me to make that decision, so it's kind of an impossible question to answer, but I saw the musical on Broadway and was a big fan. I'm very excited for the movie." "Fatal Attraction" premieres April 30 on Paramount+.
